about_the_game:
This is the official digital artbook to Clocker, which includes game concept arts and illustrations created for the game during its production by our artist Gu Yu.

Once you've purchased, you can access it by doing the following:

  • Right-click Clocker in your Steam game library.
  • Click "Properties."
  • Click on the Local Files tab.
  • Click on "Browse Local Files."
detailed_description:
Only support Chinese

Warning: Only support Chinese at this moment, the English version of it will be ready soon.


About the Game

This is the official digital artbook to Clocker, which includes game concept arts and illustrations created for the game during its production by our artist Gu Yu.

Once you've purchased, you can access it by doing the following:

  • Right-click Clocker in your Steam game library.
  • Click "Properties."
  • Click on the Local Files tab.
  • Click on "Browse Local Files."
